meanings.sent1: The spilled ink left a dinge on the paper.
meanings.sent2: She tried to scrub the dinge off the wall.
meanings.sent3: The dinge on his shirt made it look like he had been painting.
meanings.sent4: The dinge on her reputation was hard to erase.
meanings.sent5: The dinge on the carpet was a constant reminder of the accident.

meanings.sent1: Please don't dinge your clothes while playing outside.
meanings.sent2: The mud from the garden dinged the floor tiles.
meanings.sent3: He managed to dinge his white shirt with spaghetti sauce.
meanings.sent4: The rain dinged the freshly painted fence.
meanings.sent5: Try not to dinge the walls when moving furniture.

meanings.sent1: The old photograph had a dinge to it.
meanings.sent2: She painted the room in a deep dinge shade.
meanings.sent3: The dinge of the sky before a storm was ominous.
meanings.sent4: The dinge of the forest at night was eerie.
meanings.sent5: The dinge of the old building gave it a mysterious aura.
